body:
IMAP module

This is the IMAP module
imap
Tangler\Module\Imap\Module

Trigger: New email trigger

This thing monitors an IMAP box for new emails
new_email
Tangler\Module\Imap\NewEmailTrigger
  • username (string): Username of the email account
  • password (string): Password of the email account
  • hostname (string): Hostname of the imap server
  • mailbox (string): Mailbox to check
